forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 8C. ENE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 47F. ENE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 36F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
